changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.switch_inventory_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.switch_inventory_item GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.switch_inventory_item @item_id_1 dbo.id_t, @slot_id_1 TINYINT, @item_id_2 dbo.id_t, @slot_id_2 TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE dbo.Inventories SET slot_id = @slot_id_1 WHERE id = @item_id_1
UPDATE dbo.Inventories SET slot_id = @slot_id_2 WHERE id = @item_id_2
COMMIT END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK END CATCH
SET NOCOUNT OFF
